The first blood sample collect immediately prior even meal serve 20:00 followed rest period . At 22:00 participant consume even 's treatment . Lights 22:30 . DOC.criteria: Aged 25 49 year inclusive Males female Of ethnic origin Selfreport good health â€¢ Habitual consumption oily fish exceeds one fish meal per week Consumption omega3 dietary supplement previous 4 week Are smoker consume nicotine replacement product ( e.g . chew gum , ecigarettes ) Food allergy sensitivities ingredient contain investigational product foodstuff History current diagnosis drug/alcohol abuse Currently participate past 4 week participate clinical nutrition intervention study High blood pressure ( systolic 159 mm Hg diastolic 99 mm Hg ) Body Mass Index outside range 1835 kg/m2 Pregnant , try get pregnant breast feed Blood donation 300 mL three month prior screen ( 470 mL give average donation ) . Sleep disturbance and/or take sleep aid medication Currently take blood thin medication ( e.g . aspirin , warfarin , heparin ) Habitually use dietary supplement within last month ( define 3 consecutive day 4 day total ) Blood disorder ( e.g . anaemia , haemophilia , thrombocytosis ) Diagnosis type I type II diabetes Heart disorder , vascular illness History kidney liver disease , severe diseases gastrointestinal tract ( e.g . iron accumulation , iron utilization disorder , hypercalcaemia , hypercalcaemia ) , likely interfere metabolism/absorption/secretion product investigation History neurological psychiatric illness ( exclude depressive illness anxiety ) Current diagnosis depression and/or anxiety Over underactive thyroid Chronic gastrointestinal problem ( e.g .
